response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
